snippet: Kiplinger magazine will not restore Claremont McKenna College to its list, even after discovering that the school's false numbers did not affect its rank this year.
abstract: Kiplinger magazine will not restore Claremont McKenna College to its list, even after discovering that the school's false numbers did not affect its rank this year.

headline.main: Fake Data Did Not Affect Rank, But Claremont Remains Off Best 100 List
